feed.title: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin

entry.title: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin
entry.summary: One member of a mailing list expressed strong belief that an email sent was a parody, and found it amusing that important people had responded. The original email appeared to be discussing a problem with no clear solution, but one member suggested doing nothing. The email was sent to the bitcoin-dev mailing list.
